item.title: Building a Secure API Gateway with Cognito
item.description: To enable authorization the api with Amazon Cognito User Pools: Create a user pool. Check out Secure your API Gateway with Amazon Cognito User Pools for a video tutorial. In the “Method Request” > “Auth” section of the API Gateway console, select the user pool.
